articles.author: Tristan D'Amours
articles.title: Three Stars from Day 4 of WJC: Lysell, Sweden dominate all-European action - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: On an all-European afternoon, Fabian Lysell made his experience of North American ice felt. The winger made sure to remind hockey fans that the Boston Bruins drafted him in the first round of the 2021 NHL Draft.
articles.content:
Sweden made its presence felt in an all-European matchday at the 2022 World Juniors. 
The Junior Crowns established their dominance in Group B with a convincing 6-0 win over Austria. They will fight… [+4841 chars]

articles.author: Rob Harris
articles.title: ‘Exceptional’ drought reshapes food and energy supplies across Europe - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: In Western Europe, hydropower output dropped 20 percent in the second quarter of this year compared to the average, with low river and lake levels starving plants.
articles.content: The exceptional drought we have now has deprived numerous communities of water supplies and is a tragedy for our farmers, our ecosystems and for biodiversity, her office said in a statement on Friday… [+5200 chars]
